import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import bsCustomFileInput from 'bs-custom-file-input'; import { db } from '../../firebase'; export class BasicElements extends Component { state = { activeTab: 'co', quotes: [] }; customerInputRef = React.createRef(); formData = { quoteNo: '', quoteDate: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0], quoteType: '', customer: '', status: '', choose: '', refNo: '', impExp: '', currency: '', conversionRate: '', taxAmount: '', quoteValue: '', billTo: '', shipTo: '', despatchMode: '', paymentTerms: '', freightCharges: '', taxPercent: '', packingCharges: '' }; componentDidMount() { bsCustomFileInput.init(); this.fetchQuotes(); } fetchQuotes = () => { db.collection('quotes').get().then(snapshot => { const quotes = snapshot.docs.map(doc => ({ id: doc.id, ...doc.data() })); this.setState({ quotes }); }); }; handleInputChange = (field, value) => { this.formData[field] = value; }; handleSubmit = (e) => { if (e) e.preventDefault(); db.collection('quotes') .add(this.formData) .then(() => { console.log('✅ Quote saved successfully!'); this.fetchQuotes(); }) .catch((error) => { console.error('❌ Error saving quote:', error); }); }; showCustomerOverlay = () => { const overlay = document.getElementById('customerOverlay'); if (overlay) overlay.style.display = 'flex'; }; hideCustomerOverlay = () => { const overlay = document.getElementById('customerOverlay'); if (overlay) overlay.style.display = 'none'; }; selectCustomer = (name) => { if (this.customerInputRef.current) { this.customerInputRef.current.value = name; this.formData.customer = name; } this.hideCustomerOverlay(); }; render() { return (
